text: Florence Evelyn Nesbit also called Evelyn Nesbit (25 December 1884 â€“ 17 January 1967) was an American actress, model, and dancer. She was portrayed in The Girl in the Red Velvet Swing in 1955. Nesbit performed mostly in silent movies and stage plays. She also wrote two memoirs, Prodigal Days and The Story of My Life. Nesbit was born near Pittsburgh, Pennsylvania. She died at age 82 in California.
